input.sentences: my vacation was simply majestic . i saw dolphins leaping out of the sea .
these birds swooped in for a steal .
did this gazelle notice me ? i think he is posing .
the morning dew looked gorgeous on this flower .
this flower leaned towards the light | craving it .
output.sentences: On a vacation by the sea you can sometimes see dolphins simply jumping out of water.
There are often birds, which are trying to steal away unnoticed from the observer, but swooping sounds give them away.
You're lucky to have a camera around when you notice a gazelle posing as if especially for you.
A camera comes handy in the morning when roses look gorgeous.
You might see another light leaned flower.
